CustomField.description: The Message Id is an external ID concatination of [Entity.Consent.DataUsePurpose.Code]|[Entity.Capture.DateTime]|[Entity.Capture.Source]|[Entity.Capture.SourceModule]|[Entity.Capture.SourceReference]|[Entity.Capture.LocationCode] with seperator character "|" from the Consent Inbound Payload
CustomField.label: Message Id
